issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: Proxy failures during NamenodeWebHdfsMethods are not logged

comments.body: Hi [~Prabhu Joseph], Are you planning to work on this? Else i can pick it up.
Hi [~ajayydv], Will work on this. Can you make me a contributor.

AuthorizationException does not provide stacktrace for security purposes. Logger only prints the stacktrace of the Throwable and does not log the message in case if stacktrace is empty. Attached a patch which returns the message alone as part of printStackTrace() of AuthorizationException class.
